alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Roger Mills; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:08PM CDT until September 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Southwestern Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 608 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Durham, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arnett, Crawford, Harmon, and Durham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
